author: Henry Zwartz
title: People disobey coronavirus rules in the NT, causing outrage
description: Eight people disobey COVID-19 rules in the NT, with the Deputy Police Commissioner calling on Territorians to "stay at home and eat chocolate" this Easter, as the NT enters its sixth day without a new case.
content:
Posted 
April 11, 2020 11:56:34
Eight people breached COVID-19 quarantine and physical distancing rules on Easter Friday in the NT, including going to house parties, leading to an exasperated senior police officer calling on Territorians to "stay at home an… [+3891 chars]
